message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and holds immense value for those who appreciate its capabilities. Given its significance, I believe it's worth more than just monetary value; it's an investment in excellence and innovation. Considering its worth to you, I propose a fair price of $9,500. This offer allows you to acquire something extraordinary without breaking the bank, while also ensuring I receive a fair compensation for my efforts and the value I've put into this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
